description.value:
Crude Augmentations to allow a person to perform more efficient labour. Gives a Character an Extra Limb fitted with a Breacher Weapon. Increases Strength and Toughness Characteristics by +10. However reduce Agility by -10 and gain 1d10 Insanity from the considerable pain and discomfort of the uncaring implantation.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 2000 T
